amendment.description: Amendment inserts a new section clarifying a modification with respect to "Combat-Related Special Compensation".
amendment.purpose: To add a Section at the end of H.Res. 458 which makes a modification to Rules Committee Print 113-32.

action.text: On ordering the previous question on the amendment Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 228 - 195 (Roll no. 19).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cole amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
